review:
Thank you Trustpilot for sharing this amazing restaurant with us. 
Off the main road it was a hidden gem. 
Lovely ambience, fabulous deco and great service. 
We then had the best meal! 
Highly recommend

My sister and I loved the dinner we had here. The team was friendly and welcoming from the moment we entered. We enjoyed the fresh mocktails, delicious main dishes of octopus and also the vegetarian cauliflower. The desserts were also great making it an all...round positive experience. The peaceful location off the busy main street in Unawatuna is also a highlig round positive experience. The peaceful location off the busy main street in Unawatuna is also a highlight.

We had high expectations of The Social, as their online profile is slick & enticing. Wow, they did not disappoint! The setting is both relaxed & stylish, with beautiful details everywhere you look. We were really impressed with the well curated menu + knowledgeable/ personable...staff. 

The food was sublime. We ate here twice during our stay, as we wanted to try several dishes (all fantastic). The wine choices were also good, and our bottle arrived chilled to perfection. 

A highly recommended experien staff. 

The food was sublime. We ate here twice during our stay, as we wanted to try several dishes (all fantastic). The wine choices were also good, and our bottle arrived chilled to perfection. 

A highly recommended experience.

We had dinner here at this wonderfull restaurant twice at our stay in Unawatuna. All about this place is absolutely fantastic - the waiters were very friendly, helpful and informativ abort the menu - and the food was absolutely amazing. Incredible quality food: the dishes were all PERFECTLY balanced, interesting, unusual and exciting. They were multi faceted with unusual elements dotted throughout. The tuna starter was honestly on par...with food Iâ€™ve had at some of the top restaurants in London - as a dish, it was perfect. Hugest complements to the chef, the culinary expertise was absolutely superb. 

The staff were so friendly and attentive, the outdoor setting is beautifully cool with good powerful fans and the whole vibe is just wonderfully chic and relaxed. 

I hope this never gets dragged into â€˜more costlyâ€™ or â€˜less qualityâ€™ territory over time because honestly this place is a true gem.

Wonderful place, food and athmosphere. Good prices as well. Staff is very kind. The restaurant should be full everyday. The best in Unawatuna.
This was the best restaurant in the area. The food and service was amazing and the open dining felt very local. Compliments to the chef.

This place can beat most of eouropian restaurants! Every dish is a masterpiece)) My respect to the chief! 
The slow cooked pork is a miracle!
We came here for lunch while at unawatuna beach. Excellent food and great service. Great setting also. Would highly recommend.
The food was great, the waiters were very friendly and it was a nice atmosphere in the restaurant. Next time in Unawatuna we will come back!
After living in Sri Lanka for 6 yrs i can truly say i have never been in a better restaurant. Highly recommend. Worth the waiting

First some background. Iâ€™ve been travelling to Unawatuna every year (except the Covid year) for the last 8 years and Iâ€™ve tried restaurant there is.

The Social used to be based on the beach and I remember it for its excellent prawn burger. However it...has now reinvented itself and moved to a new location. Easily the classiest restaurant in Unawatuna the it exudes quality with an upmarket sophisticated vibe and feel.

Service throughout was excellent with friendly, professional service from a waiter of enormous proportions with an equally large measure of personality.

Above everything the food shines. With a unique and distinctive menu there is something to please everyone. I can highly recommend the octopus, beautifully cooked whilst my friendâ€™s slow cooked pork was equally as good.

The drinks menu is also excellent with an extensive choice.

Overall this is now easily far and away the best resin Unawatuna. A lovely secluded restaurant in the heart of one of the busiest roads in Una. We really enjoyed the food and drinks made of locally sourced ingredients of the highest quality. Everything we tried tasted so good especially the chicken wings on the starter menu...is to die for!

The service and the ambience too are highly commendable. This place definitely makes you feel like home.

A must try place during your visit to Unawatuna. We will surely be back for mo is to die for!
